name: Killearth
description:
Description:

In a world where population grow exponentially, arrange your habitant to make them reproduce together, then place them in house to reduce space. Then reproup house together with the same amount of habitant to free space but be careful because you will run out of space!

Keys:

Uses arrow to move block

Use Q and D to rotate the earth

There is differents types of block:

Adult: Can be put in house

Baby: Will grow when the countdown reach 100% and will push people when growing. If they cannot grow they will become grave.

House: When to adult are near them will let them in and will take the number 2. Then they will merge with other house of the same number and will the sum of the two number.

Wheat: Can be used on house to double number of point

Team:

-Blackwolfy
